title: Vayne % TRUE DAMAGE is a problem a big problem to building items vs her.
body: as the title says. why should any champ out there build armor or health if 14% is 14% becouse its true damage not magic or physical.  why do we even have a shop to build defenses if it does not matter. im fine with switching that to physical damage just not true damage based on %. it makes no sense on the way the game is built where you can try to counter item build a certain champ based on the damage or abilties he has.

replies.body: Vayne is one of the squishiest champions in the game and the shortest range ADC in the game so her true damage is to make up for it and make a high risk high reward champion.  lock her down and blow her up and your armor works on the rest of her team.

Aight. I'ma spell this out as simple as I can.

You are a late game tank. There is no such thing, all tanks fall off in the late game. We are strongest mid to early late but easily get outscaled. Secondly, you are a tank. You are also comparing a Jinx to Vayne. Jinx is a hyper carry who relies on finding a quick kill for resets. Vayne is someone who specializes in tank killing. Very few adcs are specd to do so. Vayne, Kog'maw, and I believe Kai'sa. You follow me now? You (a tank) got beat by Vayne (a tank killing adc.) That is what is suppose to happen. It happened. And you are only complaining because of one instance that has you tilted beyond belief. She isn't even a premier adc. If you want to be mad, be mad at yourself for not grouping to beat her with your team. Or be mad at your team for not following with damage behind what tank you brought.
